text: @realDonaldTrump The sick art of Trump’s incompetence: 26,059 Americans are DEAD as of 7:12 am April 15 because YOU eliminated the pandemic protections President @BarackObama had in place! And because YOU knew about the coronavirus for months and YOU refused to take it seriously! YOU MUST RESIGN!
